title: Bypassing Verify Humans Page
vulnerability_information:
Hi Team,
I was able to bypass verify Human dialog Box , while subscribing .
Vulnerable request:
====================
```
POST /subscribe/post HTTP/1.1
Host: stellar.us9.list-manage.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:54.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/54.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 264
Referer: https://stellar.us9.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=c001d97369b7a10d224c23867&id=563f658d41&SIGNUP=community
Cookie: _AVESTA_ENVIRONMENT=prod; PHPSESSID=5kid70ckbbvfpshmvoc6m7vqr1
DNT: 1
Connection: close
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1

u=c001d97369b7a10d224c23867&id=563f658d41&b_name=&b_email=&b_comment=&MERGE0=codelover16%40gmail.com&MERGE1=su&MERGE2=ascas&group%5B17489%5D%5B1%5D=1&submit=Subscribe+to+list&ht=8cad8bee67974ea68255fd9b15685974905f31d8%3AMTQ5ODMwMTUyNS43ODA4&mc_signupsource=hosted
```
Steps to reproduce:
====================
1. Delete Body param
```
&MERGE1=su&MERGE2=ascas&group%5B17489%5D%5B1%5D=1&submit=Subscribe+to+list&ht=8cad8bee67974ea68255fd9b15685974905f31d8%3AMTQ5ODMwMTUyNS43ODA4&mc_signupsource=hosted
```
2 . And you will be able to bypass human authentication

Impact
====================
1. This request can be brute forced , which can result to Bringing down and Spamming the Email server.
2. I was able to verify multiple accounts by changing **MERGE0** with different email addresses using same **u=** and **id=** param.

Thanks,
Suvrat(codelover16)
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi Team,
I was able to bypass verify Human dialog Box , while subscribing .

Vulnerable request:

POST /subscribe/post HTTP/1.1
Host: stellar.us9.list-manage.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:54.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/54.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 264
Referer: https://stellar.us9.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=c001d97369b7a10d224c23867&id=563f658d41&SIGNUP=community
Cookie: _AVESTA_ENVIRONMENT=prod; PHPSESSID=5kid70ckbbvfpshmvoc6m7vqr1
DNT: 1
Connection: close
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1

u=c001d97369b7a10d224c23867&id=563f658d41&b_name=&b_email=&b_comment=&MERGE0=codelover16%40gmail.com&MERGE1=su&MERGE2=ascas&group%5B17489%5D%5B1%5D=1&submit=Subscribe+to+list&ht=8cad8bee67974ea68255fd9b15685974905f31d8%3AMTQ5ODMwMTUyNS43ODA4&mc_signupsource=hosted

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Delete Body param &MERGE1=su&MERGE2=ascas&group%5B17489%5D%5B1%5D=1&submit=Subscribe+to+list&ht=8cad8bee67974ea68255fd9b15685974905f31d8%3AMTQ5ODMwMTUyNS43ODA4&mc_signupsource=hosted 2 . And you will be able to bypass human authentication

Impact

  1. This request can be brute forced , which can result to Bringing down and Spamming the Email server.
  2. I was able to verify multiple accounts by changing MERGE0 with different email addresses using same u= and id= param.

Thanks,
Suvrat(codelover16)

activities.message: This is Mailchimp issue not ours. Please let them know.
activities.markdown_message: This is Mailchimp issue not ours. Please let them know.

activities.message:
Hi Bart,
Not Being disrespectfull but If you can see the post call is still made [stellar.org] (https://www.stellar.org/) according to the policy it is included in the scope, Request you for public disclosre .
Thanks and Regards 
Suvrat Dharmadhikari(codelover16)

activities.message:
Hi HackerOneTeam,
I was able to bypass verify Human dialog Box , while subscribing to stellar.org .This was done by manipulating Post call made to the stelar.Stellar team has refused to take up the issue by saying this is the issue of Mailchimp , But I clearly see the post call was made to stellar which makes the bug inscope for stellar as per the policy .

I request HackerOne team to look over this issue .

Thanks and Regards,
Suvrat Dharmadhikari

Thanks and Regards,
Suvrat Dharmadhikari
